title: How to go about started to write a bio - Quora

response.answer_text: Tips that might help you get started with writing a bio: Write a story, not a list of your accomplishments or experiences. Your bio should show who you are and what you are about.Start with your name. People should know who you are before they learn what you do. It is also better to put important details about yourself in the first sentence and the first paragraph.Also, it is very, very, very important knowing what audience you’re writing for.You can find more here: How to Write a Biography About Yourself. And here is a an example of a good biography:  Happy writing!

Writing a bio is writing a story. Except that it’s a real story and it’s your story. You need to answer the following points: Who are you? What is your name? What do you do?Why do you do what you do?What got you to the stage you are at right nowWhy should I (the reader) care / what value will you bring?What are your values / what are you passionate about? (this is to help the reader connect with who you are)I absolutely love an about us page. https://theemergence.co.uk/how-to-write-a-twitch-bio/
